thread.title: Mother of Pistorius' girlfriend delivers daughter's speech

title: Mother of Pistorius' girlfriend delivers daughter's speech
text: Mother of Pistorius' girlfriend delivers daughter's speech Wednesday, 21 October 2015 (3 minutes ago) SOMERSET WEST, South Africa (AP) " June Steenkamp has delivered the speech her daughter Reeva had planned to give at a South African school on the day she was killed by Oscar Pistorius.June Steenkamp went back to Reeva's old high...
